name: Homi hand hoe
description:
A tool that will replace and outlast most other hand implements.The Ho-Mi is impressively strong and has a design that has been refined over centuries by practical Asian farmers and gardeners.
The Ho-Mi can be used in the vegetable and flower garden to:

* dig holes for planting and transplanting bulbs and seedlings
* open and close rows for seed planting
* loosen soil around plants
* dig weeds and thin out plants

The tool is hand forged rather than pressed making it more durable and so much stronger. The tool can be comfortably used for hours making it particularly suitable for older or arthritic gardeners.
